topic.title: Translation in several languages
topic.body:
Hello,
I'm currently talking to the owner or any person with the knowledge to point a direction :
I would like to participate to the development and the growth of this project. However, I do not have the required knowledge and coding skills to do so. So I would like to translate the content written in the Wiki, the Docs and the README to enlarge the public of this project : I speak three languages so I think that could be helpful. Hear me right : I don't want to edit the content, I want to translate it. Unfortunately, I didn't find how to do it on my own.

Could you show me a procedure to do so ?

Thankfully,
